registry.meta:
Multi-User Chat Status Codes &LEGALNOTICE; This is the official registry of Multi-User Chat Status Codes as maintained by the ®ISTRAR; and authorized by &jep0045;.
0.2 2005-04-21 psa Added codes 171 and 172 (contributed by Constantin Nickonov).
0.1 2005-04-21 psa Initial version (populated from JEP-0045, v. 1.19).

statuscode.purpose: Inform user that any occupant is allowed to see the user's full JID.
Inform user that his or her affiliation changed while not in the room.
Inform occupants that room now shows unavailable members.
Inform occupants that room now does not show unavailable members.
Inform occupants that some room configuration has changed.
Inform occupant that room UI should not allow cut-copy-and-paste operations.
Inform occupant that room UI should allow cut-copy-and-paste operations.
Inform user that a new room has been created.
Inform user that he or she has been banned from the room.
Inform all occupants of new room nickname.
Inform user that he or she has been kicked from the room.
Inform user that he or she is being removed from the room because of an affiliation change.
Inform user that he or she is being removed from the room because the room has been changed to members-only and the user is not a member.
Inform user that he or she is being removed from the room because of a system shutdown.
